categories: Category:Battles of the Onderon Civil War

nodes.text: A mission to the Planet Onderon was conducted by Human female Meetra Surik in 3951 BBY, which set off a series of conflicts between the Onderon Royalists, Onderon separatists and the Lost Jedi in an effort to find Jedi Master Kavar. Meanwhile, several Bounty hunters were hunting Surik because of the Exchange's Bounty on live Jedi.
